code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import logger from'redux-logger';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootSaga from'./root.saga';import rootReducer from'./root-reducer';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';var sagamiddle=createSagaMiddleware();var middlewares=[sagamiddle,logger];export var Store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));sagamiddle.run(rootSaga);export var persistor=persistStore(Store);//export default {Store,persistor};
